mapper.select: SELECT recentDate, recentContents FROM ( SELECT chatDate AS recentDate, chatContents AS recentContents, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cR.chatRoomId ORDER BY chatDate DESC) AS rn FROM chatRoom cR INNER JOIN chatContents cC ON cR.chatRoomId = cC.chatRoomId WHERE cR.chatRoomId = #{chatRoomId} ) WHERE rn = 1
SELECT MAX(chatDate) AS recentDate FROM chatContents WHERE chatRoomId=#{chatRoomId}

SELECT cR.hostId as hostId, cR.guestId as guestId, cC.chatSender as chatSender, cC.chatContents as chatContents, cC.chatDate as chatDate, cC.chatContentsId as chatContentsId FROM chatRoom cR INNER JOIN chatContents cC ON cR.chatRoomId = cC.chatRoomId WHERE cC.chatRoomId = #{chatRoomId}
